comments:
I20050909-2010

fixed in LaunchConfigurationProjectMainTypeChange.

When creating the refactoring changes, check if the launch config is stored inside the project. If it is, 
save the directory location relative to the project root. When asked to perform the change, get the new 
project from the workspace, find the folder that held the launch config and set the container on the 
launch config working copy before saving it.

traces.message: Unable to generate memento for  VectorTesting, shared file does not exist.
